0.2.0.name: connect20/CookiesBasedRecentlyViewedProducts
0.2.0.description: This extension keeps track of the products viewed by the visitor on the website and shows them in a carousel

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

0.1.0.name: connect20/ConversionBug_Cookiebaseproduct
0.1.0.description: The cookies based recently viewed products extension keeps a track of the products viewed by the visitor and shows the recently viewed products in a product carousel on the website.

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency
